Reviews.Title: Great device, actually looks like a car key fob
Reviews.Author: Michael Boda

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo2DM832LVHC7VCcurrentClick) { return cv_mo2DM832LVHC7VCcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 0:28 MinsI love this little camera! Works great for the price. Much easier to use than I thought it would be, just two buttons to control it. I uploaded a video I took with it in a fully lit room. The quality isn't fantastic, but much better than expected. It doesn't work very well if the room is any darker than it is in this video.I took the video standing about ten feet from the wall I was filming, so the camera is a lot more zoomed in than I thought it would be. Notice the video is a bit shakey; it seemed to me that I was holding my hand still. The audio in the video is quite echo-y, as well, but that's to be expected from such a tiny device.Overall, you won't be shooting any HD movies on this, but its great for everyday! Its a perfect size for my key chain.

Reviews.Title: Hate to give one star, but...
Reviews.Author: wutzthedeal "wutzthedeal"
Reviews.Content: The thing works, and it isn't horrible, but here's the problem; the one they are shipping is the #19 (get your Google on) and it does not have a separate crystal to keep date and time, so you have to reset the date and time via notepad on your computer EVERY time you power the unit up.  Secondly, the depth and clarity of video suffer; anything more than 20 feet away will blur.  The audio is pretty solid.  I recommend NOT using this seller, who has given me nothing but "Try this, try this, try this," type responses to set date/time (when it's IMPOSSIBLE to keep it with a #19) instead of just giving me my dam money back; had to go through Amazon and get a gift card to avoid the drama.  The next one I'm going to try is a step up  (it's the new black and silver keychain cam that reportedly has higher resolution and motion-activated recording--believe me, if it doesn't work like it says it does, I'll be twice as harsh on it... we can't let these sellers succeed at false advertising and keep making money!  MAKE them sell you a product that DOES what the ad SAYS it can do!)

Reviews.Title: Very awesome
Reviews.Author: HL mini spy camera pen
Reviews.Content: I give it five stars for its video quality that is good , good sound too and mostly that it was small and handy for when I leave my room I can see who walks in and goes through my stuff

Reviews.Title: Amazing product!
Reviews.Author: ommm "wizard"
Reviews.Content: I just received it yesterday and I let the battery charge for about 10 hrs.  I used it today for the first time, I planned on recording for about 2 hrs and it recorded for about 1:30 hrs. The video and audio have excellent quality.  I thought it had run out of battery power, but it hadn't.  I played with the on/off button and I recorded for about 15 more minutes.  I would have given it 5 stars, if it would had continued recording until the battery run out of power, and if the user's manual had specific details on the battery life.  For the price this is an amazing product!  So I am very satisfied with my investment!

Reviews.Title: Will not charge
Reviews.Author: Evo fan
Reviews.Content: The one I got will not charge. I had one from another vendor that worked. This one ended up in the trash.Cost more to return so I just threw it away.

Reviews.Title: very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Vac
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product for a gift. The item I have received was not Esky brand, as it was described in Amazon website. It was a fake! I wanted for exchange, and the seller of this product promised to send me a real product in 36 hours. This imitation of the Esky product was returned. So far, there are no answers from the seller, no real product, and no money back. I am very disappointed with the product and service.

Reviews.Title: A piece of junk...
Reviews.Author: Vaughn
Reviews.Content: A waste of pocket change... angled lens, must hold at odd angle to use properly.  Video records but there is really bad distorted sound and lots of lag in video footage.  In a 3 minute video... there will only be 10-20 framed pictures.  (this is a piece of crap.)  Dont waste your money...Disappointed FPV fanatic...

Reviews.Title: got what i paid for
Reviews.Author: Stuart A. Evans
Reviews.Content: This is cool little toy. No it isnt a movie camera but didnt expect it to be. It works as it should and has better video quality than I expected. It is a little more fragile than I expected but over all is exactley what it claims to be. The instrutions were a little lacking but a quik internet search and had it working in no time.

Reviews.Title: For the price you really can't beat it!
Reviews.Author: Scott Andrew Davies
Reviews.Content: You get all that camera in that little keychain for $10! I had to order this! And it was actually quite impressive, and to a point still is. When I first got this thing it was a bunch of fun, put it on my key ring, waited for some friends to get drunk and started rolling! anything ever come up (like an unwanted fight/road rage) this thing is perfect, no one suspects anything. HOWEVER, about two weeks after owning it something strange happened. All the sudden no sound, so I opened it up and found out the mic had knocked itself loose!I also used this on some of my RC airplanes which do vibrate however I used folded paper towels and a little piece of cell phone sticky pad, to cut down on that.Side notes: The micro SD card can easily fall behind where the slot is and possibly get stuck if you don't have small tools to get it back, low light conditions aren't that great, but you can make them out and what is going on, Easier to do with sound.Would recommend, might suggest spending $25 and getting a Better quality one.

Reviews.Title: Very good little camera
Reviews.Author: Madge
Reviews.Content: Got the camera pretty quick.  Has good video and photo quality for the resolutions stated.  Takes good videos and photos inside and outside the house. I like the way it operates.  I just haven't figured out how to use it covertly.

Reviews.Title: Rude clerk catcher
Reviews.Author: Robert Agostinho "Forever Student"
Reviews.Content: the video and audio quality are much better that I expected from such a small device. It seems that more and more sales clerks are forgetting that it's the customer that actually pays their salary. The "Me" generation could careless about how they treat customers, even when you tell them that you might report them to the manager. I have been told "well, it's your word against mine" then you show them the key chain with the camera and it's amazing how fast they change their attitude towards you. It is also a great way to record a cell phone call, point the camera at the cell phone and put it on speaker, then you have a record of what was said and the phone number and time of the call.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Maria Rivas
Reviews.Content: A great buy. For the price it is amazing, it records for two hours and the video is decent quality

Reviews.Title: Great for snooping around
Reviews.Author: Anthony Mackelprang
Reviews.Content: I have this attached to my car keys. Great for getting people caught messing around on the clock. Only down fall are the instructions. There a little vague

Reviews.Title: Very good, handy and secret.
Reviews.Author: Judith Rice
Reviews.Content: This item is great.  No one suspects.  I use this when I have to interview someone, it sure is nice to have proof, sometimes, of what actually is said and done.  Picture and video quality is perfect.  People and item are very clear and recognizable.Any one who needs back up of what is being said or done, should have this.

Reviews.Title: Works Well, Product Quality is OK...
Reviews.Author: Shobhit Deep
Reviews.Content: Works as described, the video quality is really nice for the small product. The audio quality is also very good. Actual adapter in the MicroSD slot has some gap on the bottom due to which first time I inserted the MSD Card below the actual adapter, had to open the device using two screws and pull it out using Boxer - Boxer 30 Pcs 4mm Precision Screwdriver Set - PK30 set which is a very neat product for such devices. One thing I was surprised of is that nowhere it is mentioned where this product is made. From the patent info provided in the product specs, I believe this is made in USA which gave me confidence to buy this product even without a lot of feedbacks.

Reviews.Title: Not ready for prime time
Reviews.Author: S. Frazier
Reviews.Content: I opened the box expecting to charge my little camera and then take pictures.  Turns out you need a 16GB micro SDHC Secure Digital Flash Memory Card.  Seller would be advised to raise the price and include the memory card for more satisfied customers.

Reviews.Title: piece of crap worked one time, and then it never turned on or charged back again!!!
Reviews.Author: amazon shopper
Reviews.Content: i'm a math major.  I also majored in Philosophy.  I am super computer knowledgeable.  THIS THING IS CRAP. believe me.it worked once....JUST ONCE.  then it just stopped.  one of the many mysteries of the world.

Reviews.Title: Good but not great
Reviews.Author: David Stroman
Reviews.Content: Works pretty good as a camera or a webcam. only downside is its not the greatest quality video. No way it is full 720P but u get what you pay for. I bought it for a light little camera for my r/c planes and i think it will work great for that.

Reviews.Title: Could not get to work. Would not make video. Managed to make a couple of pictures. Waste of money.
Reviews.Author: Dawn Hammons
Reviews.Content: Could not get the device to work. Poor directions. Would not make a video, but managed a couple of pictures. A big waste of money. Should have tried the pen.

Reviews.Title: pedido incompleto
Reviews.Author: sandra
Reviews.Content: El pedido de Esky® Car Key Keychain Mini Camera Hidden DVR DV Video Recorder - Support Micro SD card to 16GB (Electronics) llego solamente el cable.

Reviews.Title: Still shots aren't very good
Reviews.Author: Losun L. Espinosa "LLE"
Reviews.Content: The camera function on this sucks. The video is surprisingly decent but the camera really is horrible. The still shots really need to be upgraded.

Reviews.Title: Oh, China....why do you do this to me?
Reviews.Author: D. Doyle "eyes wide open"
Reviews.Content: While the initial quality of the video was great, after only a couple of uses it would only record for a couple of seconds and then shut off.  Also, it was impossible to reset the time/date stamp.  It seems to be stuck in 2007 and can't get out.  I wound up throwing it away.

Reviews.Title: Decent Video - Horrible Photos
Reviews.Author: Sporadic
Reviews.Content: The video is pretty decent quality for the price, the photos are horrible quality.  I think this product is worth the price.

Reviews.Title: It is what is:
Reviews.Author: Soheil Farahi
Reviews.Content: I was gonna use it as baby sitter watch dog. The quality isfine, but the auto record is weird. Sometimes gets 3 clips,sometimes 1. So u never really know how much you arereally recording since auto shoots itself as it seems. It'sjust o.k..

Reviews.Title: Piece of garbage
Reviews.Author: Robertinho T
Reviews.Content: This doesn't work be aware... Don't waste your money.. Is not expensive but is not worth to spend $8.00 then another $ 8.00 for the memory just for nothing

Reviews.Title: Awesome.
Reviews.Author: James Stoppelbein
Reviews.Content: The only negative is that they either don't mention, or I just didn't see, that it requires a micro SD card which does not come with it.  It has no internal storage and  cannot be used until you put a (for best results - Class 4) micro SD card in it.  So I had to wait 2 more days to use it for the card to arrive.  I got a 16GB card from Amazon for about $10. Close range audio is perfect and loud, video quality is excellent. Obviously you cannot expect HD video.  It is more than worth what you pay.  I have not yet tested the length of recording but did make three short recordings with it.  When I plug it in , as instructed, A box pops up on my computer, I click it and video instantly plays through Windows Media Player.  It is my opinion that those who left reviews saying it didn't work, did not read the instructions and they tried to use it without a Micro SD card.  If you read the instructions and follow them step by step, you can't go wrong.  If you skim through the instructions, I can see how you could get frustrated.  It takes a minute to figure it out.  The instructions for changing the date/time stamp are lacking.  Definitely have to be a little computer savy to figure that part out.  You have to save the file to the "TAG" device.

Reviews.Title: Update to review
Reviews.Author: G-Man
Reviews.Content: This is an update to my last review, to be fair.  After charging the unit a few times the battery became better.  It now lasts longer.  Maybe not the two hours but enough for what I use it.

Reviews.Title: not working
Reviews.Author: bali
Reviews.Content: i got my  car key camera befor a vew days ago but is not working , not recomende to buy it

Reviews.Title: Does not include Micro SD card
Reviews.Author: bodasm@yahoo.com
Reviews.Content: For lesser price you can the similar product with micro SD card.  So you can spend money if you must on this product. I will not.

Reviews.Title: didn't work
Reviews.Author: George E Donaldson
Reviews.Content: Didn't not work after a full charge.  Followed instructions and even did a reset but device did not work.  I could not turn them on.  All three had the same problem.

Reviews.Title: Hard for me to figure out.
Reviews.Author: D. Gray
Reviews.Content: I have tried mine a few times and it has not worked as I wanted it to.  I need to know it is working.  I don't feel confident I will get what I need when I use it.  I missed a couple of very important conversations thinking it was recording and it was not.

Reviews.Title: Not that kind of camera.
Reviews.Author: Zheng
Reviews.Content: Pros:- low price- simple control- more than one way to transfer files from cameraCons:- one charge of battery doesn't take you "far" enough.- the "chain" got broken on second day of use.- not clear upon what condition camera starts a new video file -- it is not always by size of file or by duration.- no indication that camera ran out of power and turned off.- body of camera warms a bit too much when charging.- needs some simple filter on high volume in audio.- when watching the video it is less noticeable how low is the picture quality :)))

Reviews.Title: key chain camera
Reviews.Author: royal
Reviews.Content: The thing does not work dont waste your money on it. I haveasked to return it and get know responce. I am very unhappy withthis item and i want my money back................

Reviews.Title: Piece of JUNK-Deceptive-Buyer Beware!!!
Reviews.Author: K. Burns
Reviews.Content: Not only is this $12.00 camera worth less then what I paid for it, I am upset with the Seller of this item as they advertised specs for a much newer model.  I have what appear to be a few models behind AND I just bought it at the end of July 2013. Video & Pictures are terrible...worse than my 2001 flip phone...sound quality sucks and the frame rate is more like 7-10FPM...NOT 30FPM. Unless you have $12.00 that you want to toss away for no good reason, I'd pass on this and remember..."you get what you pay for"!

Reviews.Title: Nice idea
Reviews.Author: MS FACS teacher
Reviews.Content: I saw this product in the mall for way more money than charged here.  It was my intent to use it with my kids so that they could make quick videos in class but since it doesn't come with all of the parts included that has not yet happened.  I would have given it a 5 if it included everything needed to make a video instantly.

Reviews.Title: This is another piece for the bin
Reviews.Author: Veron
Reviews.Content: This comes without the SD card so I still do  not  know if it can work.  This is not worth my money; similar to the Pen camera.  These items are not worth going on the market  until these manufacturers can correct these faults.  Is there a way I can get a refund?  I have no clue which card to get for it.  There was nothing to indicate I was just getting the shell.

ProductInfo.Features:
1.3M photo taking and 720p HD video recording!
Supports up to 16GB micro SD / SDHC memory cards
Video Resolution: 720 x480 28-30FPS
Photo Resolution: JPG 1280 x 1024
Easy to download video and photos to PC/Mac. Plug & Play!
ProductInfo.Name: Esky® Car Key Keychain Mini Camera Hidden DVR DV Video Recorder - Support Micro SD card to 16GB
